line: Are you a goat? Because I am climbing vertically up a mountain to escape you.
Are you an explosion? because I am running from you.
Are you a sad movie? Because you make me cry.
Are you Tiali? Because you make me feel attacked.
Are you SpaceX? Because you make me wanna escape to mars.
Are you a spam bot? Because I wanna report you.
Are you Asthma? Because I really want to get rid of you.
Are you my neighbours late night party? Because I cannot stand you and I'm gonna call the police if you don't stop.
Are you a bad diet? Because I want to avoid you.
Are you Elliot? Because I don't want to marry you.
